title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe the foundation of the authority of OSHA to carry out policy regarding working conditions.

For Task A2, the response must explain how the federal courts can influence OSHA’s authority.

For Task B, the response must explain how the ideology of the president may influence the powers of OSHA.

For Task C1, the response must describe an action Congress could take to provide oversight for OSHA in this scenario.

For Task C2, the response must explain how divided government might impact Congress’s ability to oversee OSHA.
